College of Creation.name: Animating Performance
College of Creation.hitPoints: Hit Points: 10 + 5 times your bard level

actions.name: Force Empowered Slam
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit 
 reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d10 + proficiency bonus force damage.

abilities.name: Immutable Form
abilities.description: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

abilities.name: Irrepressible Dance
abilities.description: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Flame Seed
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, range 60 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d6 + PB fire damage.

actions.name: Fiery Teleportation
actions.description: The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within 5 feet of it teleport up to 15 feet to unoccupied spaces you can see. Then each creature within 5 feet of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take 1d6 + PB fire damage.

Battle Smith.name: Steel Defender
Battle Smith.hitPoints: Hit Points: 2 + your Intelligence modifier + 5 times your artificer level (the defender has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your artificer level)

actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.description: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

actions.name: Deflect Attack
actions.description: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.
